scripts.preprocess: rm -rf preprocessed && cp -R src/ preprocessed/ && replace-in-file BUILD_ENV development preprocessed/*.js
scripts.preprocess--production: rm -rf preprocessed && cp -R src/ preprocessed/ && replace-in-file BUILD_ENV production preprocessed/*.js
scripts.build: yarn run preprocess && rm lib || true && babel preprocessed -d lib
scripts.build--production: yarn run preprocess--production && rm lib || true && babel preprocessed -d lib
